title: The Herald newsreel
brief_description: One of the first sound films produced in Australia, this newsreel shows Joe Lyons, Prime Minister 1931-1939, and his Cabinet giving a message for Britain and the sister dominions, after swearing in at Government House. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
